message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to buy this amazing product from me. I've done my research and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to offer you a deal at $900000. This is a great price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $850000. This is a competitive price, and I think it's a fair compromise.
